title: Iran Clears Way for Crypto Investment Funds
description:
Iran’s capital market is preparing for a major shift as new regulations finalize the long-awaited framework for crypto-based investment funds.

With the Central Bank’s supervisory rules now in place and Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE) completing its operational model, officials say the market is ready t...

title: Iran currency rates blacked out online as rial suffers
description:
TEHRAN, Oct 09, 2012 (AFP) - Currency rates online for Iran's pummelled rial were blacked out on Tuesday, while transactions on the open market remained virtually paralysed a week after the money's collapse.

Sites such as Mesghal.com and Mazanex.com had rates blanked out for the rial's value agains...

title: Iran risks severe economic downturn, unrest as renewed UN sanctions bite
description:
By Parisa Hafezi

DUBAI (Reuters) -Iran's economy is at risk of simultaneous hyperinflation and severe recession, officials and analysts say, as clerical rulers scramble to preserve stability with limited room to manoeuvre after a snapback of U.N. sanctions.

title: Israel-Iran tensions could widen India's CAD by 0.3% of GDP, says ICRA
description: New Delhi [India], June 23 (ANI): If the heightened tension in the West Asia pushes average crude prices by USD 10 per barrel, it will typically push up India's net oil imports by nearly USD 13-14 billion during the year, enlarging the India's CAD by 0.3 per cent of GDP, noted a recent report by ICR...
